\w What|strong="G5101"\w* \w then|strong="G3767"\w*? \w Know|strong="G1492"\w* \w you|strong="G3739"\w* \w not|strong="G3756"\w*, \w that|strong="G3754"\w* \w to|strong="G1519"\w* \w whom|strong="G3739"\w* \w you|strong="G3739"\w* yield \w yourselves|strong="G1438"\w* \w servants|strong="G1401"\w* \w to|strong="G1519"\w* \w obey|strong="G5219"\w*, \w his|strong="G1438"\w* \w servants|strong="G1401"\w* \w you|strong="G3739"\w* \w are|strong="G1510"\w* \w whom|strong="G3739"\w* \w you|strong="G3739"\w* \w obey|strong="G5219"\w*, \w whether|strong="G2228"\w* \w it|strong="G3739"\w* \w be|strong="G1510"\w* \w of|strong="G1401"\w* \w sin|strong="G0266"\w* unto \w death|strong="G2288"\w*, \w or|strong="G2228"\w* \w of|strong="G1401"\w* \w obedience|strong="G5218"\w* unto \w justice|strong="G1343"\w*.
